    • Method Detail

      • createBill

        @RolesAllowed(value="SaveBill")
public BillEto createBill(BillEto bill)
        Description copied from interface: UcManageBill
        Create a BillEto and save it in the database by linking the billed order positions with it. A bill also consists of the total amount as well as the tip, the waiter could fill in. The tip is at default 0.0.
        Specified by:
        createBill in interface UcManageBill
        Parameters:
        bill - that gets created in the database.
        Returns:
        the created BillEto

      • verifyNotClosed

        private void verifyNotClosed(OrderPosition position)

      • update

        private BillEto update(BillEto bill)
        This method updates a BillEntity by checking the existence of a bill with that id in the database. If no such BillEntity exists, a new bill will be created by calling UcManageBillImpl#create(List, Money). Otherwise, the existing BillEntity will be updated by overriding the set order positions, tip and the total amount.
        Parameters:
        bill - The BillEntity to update.
        Returns:
        the updated BillEntity

      • deleteBill

        @RolesAllowed(value="DeleteBill")
public void deleteBill(Long billId)
        Description copied from interface: UcManageBill
        This method deletes a BillEto from the database by its given id.
        Specified by:
        deleteBill in interface UcManageBill
        Parameters:
        billId - the ID of the BillEto that has to be deleted.

      • doPayment

        @RolesAllowed(value="SaveBill")
public PaymentStatus doPayment(BillEto bill)
        Description copied from interface: UcManageBill
        This method provides the payment process. It provides the cash-only functionality without any additional PaymentData.
        Specified by:
        doPayment in interface UcManageBill
        Parameters:
        bill - is the identifier of the BillEto on which the payment process takes place.
        Returns:
        the status code of the payment process.

        Description copied from interface: UcManageBill
